580:1: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma-yasmin khalu punarānanda samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate,
580:4: tasmin ānanda samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
580:5: te sarve saṃśayitā bhavanti-kimayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā,
580:7: punaraparamānanda tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ śokaśalyaviddhā bhavanti yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati|
580:8: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
580:11: tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya viheṭhāmupasaṃharanti,
580:14: digdāhānupadarśayanti-apyeva nāma ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'valīyeta vā romaharṣo vā asya bhavet,
580:16: tatra ānanda na sarvasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
580:19: ānanda āha-kiyadrūpasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upasaṃkrāmati māraḥ pāpīyān viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ?
580:20: bhagavānāha-yena ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmadhimukticittaṃ notpāditaṃ bhavati,
580:21: asya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
580:23: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ saṃśayaprāpto bhavati,
580:26: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
580:28: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati,
580:30: sa gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na śṛṇoti,
580:33: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
580:35: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'saddharmaparigrāhakamālīno bhavati-eṣa mama sahāyakaḥ,
580:37: bahavo'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mamānye'pi sahāyakāḥ santi|
580:39: ayaṃ tu mayā pratirūpaḥ sahāyo labdhaḥ|
580:41: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
580:43: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmanyaṃ bodhisattvamevaṃ vadet-gambhīrā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā|
580:45: na hyevamatra yujyamānamanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitam|
580:49: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
580:51: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nyān bodhisattvānavamanyate-ahaṃ vivekavihāreṇa viharāmi,
580:54: tasminnānanda samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati,
580:58: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ vā gotragrahaṇaṃ vā dhutaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ vā bhavati,
580:59: evaṃ sa tāvanmātrakeṇa tato'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān kalyāṇadharmaṇo'vamanyate|
580:60: te ca tasya guṇā na saṃvidyante,
580:61: ye'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ guṇāḥ,
580:62: te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tasya na saṃvidyante|
580:65: parān paṃsayati-na khalvete teṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyante,
580:67: tatra mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmevaṃ bhavati- na śūnyāni mārabhavanāni bhaviṣyanti,
580:69: mahānirayāstiryañcaḥ pretaviṣayā āsurāśca kāyā utsadā bhaviṣyantīti|
580:71: yathā te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ pravṛttā adhyākrāntā lābhasatkāreṇa bhaviṣyanti,
580:74: teṣāṃ ca sa mahājanaḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ maṃsyate|
580:79: evaṃ te na tathatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā na tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānāḥ saṃkleśaṃ vivardhayiṣyanti|
580:80: evaṃ te viparyastayā cittasaṃtatyā yadyadeva karma ārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
580:85: imamapyānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati||
580:86: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayati,
580:87: tasmin samaye mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhavati-dūrīkariṣyati batāyaṃ kulaputraḥ sarvajñatām,
580:88: atidūre sthāsyati sarvajñatāyāḥ sacetpunarbodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo'nyena bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośati paribhāṣate vyāpadyate doṣamutpādayati,
580:89: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān bhūyasyā mātrayā tuṣṭo bhavati,
580:91: evaṃ cāsya bhavati-ubhāvapyetau bodhisattvau dūre sthāsyataḥ sarvajñatāyā iti||
580:92: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛto'vyākṛtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ kalahāyet vivadet vigṛhṇīyāt ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayet,
580:94: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittotpāde tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ,
580:96: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat-asti bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ kiṃcinniḥsaraṇam,
580:97: utāho tāvata eva kalpānavaśyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ?
580:98: bhagavānāha-saniḥsaraṇamānanda mayā dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānām|
580:99: tatra ānanda yo'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya na pratideśayati,
580:104: avaśyaṃ tena ānanda pudgalena punareva tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ|
580:105: yaḥ punarānanda bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya pratideśayati,
580:107: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayati-yena mayā sarvasattvānāṃ vigrahā vivādā virodhā utsārayitavyā nidhyāpayitavyāḥ praśamayitavyāḥ,
580:113: paruṣaṃ vā karkaśaṃ vā prativaco dadāmi|
580:116: parato duruktāni durāgatāni durbhāṣitāni bhāṣyamāṇāni śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nāghātayitavyam|
580:127: na ca mayā svaparāddheṣvapi pareṣu vyāpattavyam|
580:131: na ca mayā jīvitāntarāye'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
580:134: evaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikānāmapi pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam,
580:137: kathaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena apareṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam?
580:139: ete mama bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śāstāra ityevaṃ sthātavyam|
580:152: evaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyo na bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
